setup: 1. Copy this file to config.json (do not commit config.json to version control)
2. Replace all {{PLACEHOLDER}} values with your actual data
3. Update persona information to match your digital twin
4. Customize UI text for your language and brand
5. Define search categories relevant to your domain
6. Adjust theme colors to match your brand palette
7. Update sidebar tools for your expertise area
8. Create suggested questions appropriate to your persona
9. Update prompts/generic-persona-instructions.ts with detailed persona definition
deployment: - Test with your custom persona prompts
- Ensure avatar image is in place
- Run build and test all functionality
- Test voice pronunciation if using custom voice
